scripts.build:docs: bun run build && cd packages/docs && bun run build
scripts.build:docs:dev: bun run build:dev && cd packages/docs && bun run build
scripts.dev: bun run build:dev && cd packages/docs && bun run dev
scripts.play: bun run build:dev && cd packages/playground && bun run dev
scripts.logs: bun run build:dev && cd packages/logs && bun run dev
scripts.update:tw: bun i tailwindcss@latest @tailwindcss/cli@latest && cd packages/docs && bun i @tailwindcss/vite@latest && cd ../playground && bun i @tailwindcss/vite@latest
scripts.publish:alpha: bun run build && cd packages/daisyui && bun publish --tag=alpha
scripts.publish:beta: bun run build && cd packages/daisyui && bun publish --tag=beta
